name: EnveLoo - Black & White
description:
EnveLoo [ON-ve-loo], a chic little bag designed to make using a public loo with your toddler a breeze.

When little kids have gotta go, they've gotta go now. EnveLoo is a clutch that's small enough to go everywhere with you and big enough to organize the things you need when you take a toddler to a public restroom. 

EnveLoo is made of durable, water resistant nylon on the outside, cotton on the inside, and is fully washable. A Velcro closure, an organizing divider, and a belt clip help keep everything handy.

Size: 6.5" x 9"

Please note:
-Cleanwell hand sanitizing spray is available separately.
-Carabiner is not intended for use in any climbing activities.

name: Let's Go Kit
description:
Want a jump start on filling your EnveLoo? EnveLoo's Let's Go Kit, includes: 

-1 Cleanwell sanitizing hand spray
-1 Soft Tub Pampers Kandoo Flushable Wipes, Sensitive (42 Wipes)
-3 Summer Infant disposable potty protectors with adhesive strips OR 3 Munchkin Arm & Hammer Disposable Changing Pads
-2 pairs disposable Gotta Go Mitts for your child's hands
-2 pair disposable adult poly gloves 

Please note:
-Let's Go Kit is FINAL SALE.
-These items are NOT toys. Do not permit children to play with them!
-To avoid danger of suffocation, choking or other injury, use these items ONLY with adult supervision.
-Child should NEVER be left unattended. 
-Gotta Go Mitts, poly gloves, wipes, potty seat covers and changing pads can be a choking hazard if placed in a child's mouth. Gotta Go Mitts are to be used under parental supervision.
-Be sure to dispose of all items properly. Potty protectors, changing pads, Gotta Go Mitts and poly gloves are not flushable.
